text: jab Allah taâ€™ala ne farmaaya ke aye Isa! main tujhe pura lene waala hoon, aur tujhe apni jaanib uthaane waala hoon aur tujhe kaafiro se paak karne waala hoon aur tere tabedaaro ko kaafiro ke upar rakhne waala hoon qayaamath ke din tak, phir tum sab ka lautna meri hee taraf hai, main hee tumhaare aapas ke tamaam tar eqtelafaath ka faisla karonga
